Just some questions before creating several PR's, I have around 30 python packages to add:

- Do I make a single PR per standalone package better than a PR with 30 packages?

- After looking into the open/closed issues, I see that we want to follow the pypi.io approach for python packages, but this url is redirecting to pypi.org. Does anyone know the reason of the readdressing? 

- Do we maintain the pypi.io url's?
title: Adding new package: py-4suite-xml
